thread.section_title: Lookupfare Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lookupfare | lookupfare.com
thread.title: Pamela Y Bishop
thread.title_full: Lookupfare reviewed by Pamela Y Bishop

author: Pamela Y Bishop
title: Pamela Y Bishop
text:
I would highly recommend lookupfare for any travel needs.
Paul helped me change my tickets (3) destination, my rental car, helped me save money, added assistance for my mother a w/c to meet her at the gate due to age and ambulation problems. He was patient, he was very knowledgeable in his job and getting me the assistance I needed and saved me money.
I was so stressed and he worked everything out for me and I could not thank him enough.
Now my vacation in July is set and I can relax stress free. Great customer service !
Pam Bishop
